title: Funeral for a Friend - Gregway
description:
A dear member of our team is no longer with us. Greg gives him a send off worthy of a king. 

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/MERCH: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to a [Music] gregway you know ladies and gentlemen we have a lot of fun here on gameover grey.com and I'm happy you're along for the Ryo it's time we have to have a serious conversation here um sorry uh you know we've been doing this YouTube channel now for about a year and a half and it's been awesome it's been great you get to connect with you guys and we've made a lot of friends along the way but uh we have to we have to say goodbye to one of them we have to say goodbye to of them today um Mike is moving out of the house no we're not saying goodbye to Mike Mike owns the kitchen table Mike owns the kitchen table that has been in every production on gameover greg.com and he is taking it with him so we got you got to say goodbye to the old girl and wish her well how do I say goodbye to a table with four legs I've known so long she was strong made of wood and she always listened to Colin be stupid and I'll take with me the memories to be my sunshine after

how do I say goodbye to a table with four legs I've known so long she was strong made of wood and she always listened to Colin be stupid and I'll take with me the memories to be my sunshine after rain oh it's so hard to say goodbye to tables with foray Greg [Music] away
